summary: A documentary where Jackie Chan and his stuntman team show you the secrets of some of the great stunts they do in films. The film also takes you on the sets of "Who Am I?" and "Rush Hour".
cast: Jackie Chan|Ken Lo|Bradley James Allan|Anthony Carpio|Mars|Chung Chi Li|Rocky Cheung|Andy Cheng|Jackie Chan Stunt Team|Rocky Lai|Man Tsui|Choi-Nam Yip|Danielle Chau|Brett Ratner|Ron Smoorenburg|Biao Yuen
title: Jackie Chan: El especialista
